languages.text: "Мне всегда казалось, что у слуг Администратума чернильные сердца и их не волнует власть. Однако им не чужды интриги знати".

traits.locale_text: "Мне всегда казалось, что у слуг Администратума чернильные сердца и их не волнует власть. Однако им не чужды интриги знати".

languages.text: "I always thought that servants of the Administratum had hearts of ink, that they were indifferent to power struggles. Now I see that they are no strangers to intrigue."
languages.original_text: "Мне всегда казалось, что у слуг Администратума чернильные сердца и их не волнует власть. Однако им не чужды интриги знати".

traits.locale_text: "I always thought that servants of the Administratum had hearts of ink, that they were indifferent to power struggles. Now I see that they are no strangers to intrigue."
"I always thought that servants of the Administratum had hearts of ink, that they were indifferent to power struggles. Now I see that they are no strangers to intrigue."
"I always thought that servants of the Administratum had hearts of ink, that they were indifferent to power struggles. Now I see that they are no strangers to intrigue."
"I always thought that servants of the Administratum had hearts of ink, that they were indifferent to power struggles. Now I see that they are no strangers to intrigue."
"I always thought that servants of the Administratum had hearts of ink, that they were indifferent to power struggles. Now I see that they are no strangers to intrigue."
"I always thought that servants of the Administratum had hearts of ink, that they were indifferent to power struggles. Now I see that they are no strangers to intrigue."

languages.text: 「帝国行政局のお役人さんは心までインクでできていて、権力争いには無関心だと、ずっと思っておりました。ですが今ではわかります。彼らも策謀とは無縁ではなかったのですね」
languages.original_text: "I always thought that servants of the Administratum had hearts of ink, that they were indifferent to power struggles. Now I see that they are no strangers to intrigue."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国行政局のお役人さんは心までインクでできていて、権力争いには無関心だと、ずっと思っておりました。ですが今ではわかります。彼らも策謀とは無縁ではなかったのですね」

languages.text: "Ich dachte immer, dass die Diener des Administratums Herzen aus Tinte haben, dass ihnen Machtkämpfe egal sind. Nun erkenne ich, dass sie durchaus zu Intrigen fähig sind."
languages.original_text: "I always thought that servants of the Administratum had hearts of ink, that they were indifferent to power struggles. Now I see that they are no strangers to intrigue."

traits.locale_text: "Ich dachte immer, dass die Diener des Administratums Herzen aus Tinte haben, dass ihnen Machtkämpfe egal sind. Nun erkenne ich, dass sie durchaus zu Intrigen fähig sind."

languages.text: « J'ai toujours cru que les serviteurs de l'Administratum avaient un cœur d'encre, que les luttes de pouvoir les laissaient indifférents. Je vois maintenant qu'ils n'ont aucun scrupule à se livrer à l'intrigue. »
languages.original_text: "I always thought that servants of the Administratum had hearts of ink, that they were indifferent to power struggles. Now I see that they are no strangers to intrigue."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai toujours cru que les serviteurs de l'Administratum avaient un cœur d'encre, que les luttes de pouvoir les laissaient indifférents. Je vois maintenant qu'ils n'ont aucun scrupule à se livrer à l'intrigue. »

languages.text: «Siempre creí que a los siervos del Administratum les corría tinta por las venas, que se mostraban indiferentes a las luchas de poder. Ahora veo que no son ajenos a las confabulaciones».
languages.original_text: "I always thought that servants of the Administratum had hearts of ink, that they were indifferent to power struggles. Now I see that they are no strangers to intrigue."

traits.locale_text: «Siempre creí que a los siervos del Administratum les corría tinta por las venas, que se mostraban indiferentes a las luchas de poder. Ahora veo que no son ajenos a las confabulaciones».

languages.text: “我一直以为内政部的仆人只在乎文字和记录，对权力斗争漠不关心。现在我明白了，他们对阴谋诡计并不陌生。”
languages.original_text: "I always thought that servants of the Administratum had hearts of ink, that they were indifferent to power struggles. Now I see that they are no strangers to intrigue."

traits.locale_text: “我一直以为内政部的仆人只在乎文字和记录，对权力斗争漠不关心。现在我明白了，他们对阴谋诡计并不陌生。”

languages.text: "Administratum hizmetkârlarının hep güç mücadelelerine kayıtsız, mürekkep yürekli olduklarını sanırdım. Demek onlar da entrikaya alet olabiliyormuş."
languages.original_text: "I always thought that servants of the Administratum had hearts of ink, that they were indifferent to power struggles. Now I see that they are no strangers to intrigue."

traits.locale_text: "Administratum hizmetkârlarının hep güç mücadelelerine kayıtsız, mürekkep yürekli olduklarını sanırdım. Demek onlar da entrikaya alet olabiliyormuş."

languages.original_text: "I always thought that servants of the Administratum had hearts of ink, that they were indifferent to power struggles. Now I see that they are no strangers to intrigue."
